title: CJIS Compliance Audit
description: An analyst for a police department must audit their systems to ensure compliance with the FBI's Criminal Justice Information Services (CJIS) security policy.

tasks.description: Verify that all personnel with access to CJIS data have undergone the required background checks and security training.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms that all authorized users meet the personnel security requirements.

tasks.description: Audit the advanced authentication controls to ensure that MFA is required for all access to CJIS data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms that MFA is correctly implemented and enforced.

tasks.description: Review network diagrams and firewall rules to ensure the systems housing CJIS data are in a secure, isolated network segment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst verifies that the required network segmentation is in place.
